10018000000:
Let’s go out and look
for never-before-seen
Pokémon!
10019000000:
Someday, I want to be a
great Trainer like my dad!
10049000000:
Yup, I’d like to see how far
your bond will carry you.
10051000000:
Get ready for your hardest
Pokémon battle yet!
10062000000:
Strong Pokémon.
Weak Pokémon.
That is only the selfish
perception of people.
10021000000:
I am the most powerful
Trainer in the world!
10002000000:
I’m so happy to be friends
with you!
10020000000:
I can’t let you get strong
all by yourself!
10004000000:
The only thing on my mind
during a battle is victory!
10106000000:
We’re going to see whose
star shines brightest!
10095000000:
Do your best not
to bore me with a
yawn-inducing battle.
10153000000:
What a relief it would be
if I could, for once, have
a serious battle against
an opponent!
10048000000:
A beautiful loss is still a
loss, and an ugly win is
still a win!
10101100000:
My cooking will put a smile
on your face!
10096100000:
Ah, hello!
I will be serving you today!
Oh, is that not why you
called me?
10111000000:
There’s no need for words
now. We will battle to
determine who is stronger—
us or them.
10091000000:
As a Champion of the
Pokémon League,
I accept any challenge!
10017000000:
Always believe in your
Pokémon’s potential, and
accept every battle you’re
challenged to!
10112000000:
If you wanna go exploring,
I’m your guy! The beach,
the mountains, or even high
in the sky!
10090000000:
When it comes down to it, I’m just the
strongest there is right now.
10106100000:
I live my life grandly and
happily by walking the fine
line between beauty and
eccentricity!
10114000000:
If you wish, I will show you
my powers!
10151000000:
Whenever and wherever,
dance, dance, dance!
10125000000:
Destruction in human
form—it’s your boy Guzma!
10121000000:
Don’t you think some
dummies are cute in
their dumbness?
10131000000:
The future is now,
thanks to science!
10127000000:
That was wonderful work. 
You were elegant—
infuriatingly so! It was
utterly glorious!
10113000000:
Do you know about the
Steel type? They are very
hard, cold, sharp, and
really strong!
10128000000:
I won’t give up!
My Pokémon have
given me the courage
and strength to fight.
I have to win—
for their sake!
10116000000:
United like this, our
dream team has no
chance of losing!
10170000000:
Umm... That’s right. You!
Use Bug-type Pokémon!
10048100000:
I’ve got to keep my fangs
sharp so I can have the
best battles possible.
10130000000:
My Pokémon and I will show
you what makes us special!
10148000000:
I can now see what
others cannot...
10091010000:
A Champion is prepared to
face any and all challenges
without fear of defeat!
10090400000:
We’re the hottest, coolest
team around.
10002400000:
Parties and Pokémon
are similar—you’ve gotta
have fun with both!
10119000000:
I’m going to show my
full power... My REAL
full power!
10120000000:
My sweet Pokémon...
I promise I’ll keep you safe...
10021010000:
That championship is as
good as ours!
10017100000:
A perfectly coordinated
team—that’s our style!
You can leave defense
to us!
10007400000:
Rawr! Trick or treat, trick
or treat, give me something
good to eat!
10020400000:
Hey! Did you prepare some
candy for tonight?
10115000000:
Every one of my Pokémon
is top class in potential.
They’re all potential
game breakers!
10215000000:
This chapter should
be titled...
“A Sudden Encounter!
Miraculous Contest
Scouting!”
That’s what I’d call it!
10100000000:
This is an awesome
opportunity! Would you
battle with me?
10102000000:
Hey there!
What a beautiful place!
Don’t you agree?
10243000000:
All of Pasio’s a stage, and
we’re gonna be top billing!
Just you wait and see!
10016400000:
Let’s help deliver some joy!
Time to hit the runway!
10008400000:
I’m sure it would make
everyone happy to see
such a big tree decorated!
10089000000:
I’ll become the bridge
between Pokémon and
humans! That’s my ideal!
10126000000:
I want you to understand
everything about me and
my Pokémon!
10118400000:
My resolution is to face
everyone I meet with
everything I’ve got!
10111400000:
A new year, a new day...
and new Pokémon battles!
I’m so grateful for it all!
10124000000:
Time for you to see that I 
can do more than just cook!
10132000000:
Indeed! I’ll train you a little!
Follow me!
10130400000:
It’s great to use words to
express how you feel, and
if you add a small present
to it, your feelings might be
better understood!
10116400000:
When you give a present,
it’s full of all of your
feelings! I think that’s why
presents can be so special.
10256000000:
Maybe my songs don’t
make anyone happy. Maybe
I can’t help. ♪
But still the only thing I can
do is sing—sing my
humble song. ♪
10196000000:
The only way to create a
world where people live in
beauty, a world without
conflict or theft, is to
reduce the number of
living things.
10158000000:
You know, I’d really love to
learn more about how a
strong Trainer like you
raises their Pokémon.
10092800000:
I’m the Pokémon League
Champion, and I’m going to
defeat you!
10245000000:
I’ve got everyone’s cheers
backin’ me! I’m really, really
gonna win this time, got it?
10247000000:
Well, everyone! I bid you
farewell for today! But
don’t you fret. I’ll always be
around to make sure
everyone in Galar can have
a champion time!
10122000000:
I think it’ll be a blast to
explore the unknown
together with you! I’m
looking forward to it!
10123000000:
Let’s be so energized today
that we shine even brighter
than the sun and the moon!
10126400000:
If you’re happy, that makes
me happy, too!
10170400000:
Anything that brings out
the beauty in Bug-type
Pokémon makes my
heart flutter.
10249000000:
No matter what kind of plan
your refined mind may be
plotting, my partner and I
will be sure to sink it.
10250000000:
I’ll use karate along with
my Pokémon’s moves!
10257000000:
Bring the storm! My partner
will send everyone in the
stadium flying!
10117000000:
It’s time for a Pokémon
Battle Royal! Ready...fight!
10192000000:
Though you are but a child,
your eyes tell me of your
fierce determination. My
heart is pounding in
my chest...
10193000000:
That’s quite a fierce
expression for such a wee
little scamp.
10161000000:
Old Hala is here to make
you holler!
10160000000:
Whatever is kicking up
such lovely splashes must
be rather big... A strapping
young swimmer, perhaps?
Or an amazing
Pokémon specimen?
10149000000:
Marowak was so pleased by
your right answer that he
simply had to battle you!
10243400000:
Our beachside pop-up,
Dine-A-Max, is open
for business!
10245400000:
We’re gonna get everyone
excited about our pop-up!
10066010000:
Sync pairs of Pasio! Show
us the finest battle we’ve
ever seen!
10135000000:
Yo! You and me—we should
get down to the kind of
battle that can happen
only here on Pasio!
10150000000: The wind is finally with us!
10247100000:
Feel the power of our
sync stone!
10089400000:
Show your Pokémon your
true, unwavering love!
10118500000:
This battle is to show you
all how truly thankful I am!
Let’s go, Lunala!
10090500000:
Rayquaza and I will blow
your imagination away!
10021800000:
I’m gonna be the strongest
Trainer in the world!
10110100000:
My policy is an all-out
offensive with Water-type
Pokémon!
10008100000:
What fine weather we have
today. It’s perfect for a
nap...or a Pokémon battle,
I suppose!
10148400000:
Welcome to the wonderful
world of ghost Pokémon!
10095400000:
Who’s there? Who is so
uncouth as to disturb
my sleep?
10125400000:
I’ll rip that victory away
from you if it’s the last
thing I do!
10158400000:
I’ll show everyone the
finest acting and battling
I have to offer!
10004400000:
I’m gonna stand out and win
this battle!
10259000000:
Ah, here! It’s a book I wrote!
I even signed it. That makes
it a collector’s item.
10106800000:
Did our fantastic speed
leave you dizzy?
10249400000:
This is a little gift from us...
I hope you can take it!
10247400000:
It’s my job as Champion to
make an appearance
whenever I’m called!
10120100000:
Unleash your power to
protect people and
Pokémon alike!
10048800000:
I’m going to flip a coin. Will
it be heads or tails?
10162000000:
I’m not letting those
criminals get away
with this!
10091200000:
Time isn’t flowing. And
space isn’t stable. A world
where the rules are broken.
10114400000:
I hope we all have a
wonderful new year.
10115400000:
Looks like we’re starting
off this year on the
right foot!
10245410000:
Don’t let your guard down
just ’cause we’re cute!
We’ll eat you right up!
10250400000:
My heart is full just from
being surrounded by the
scent of baked goods...
10116100000:
No matter what kind of
nightmares everyone is
having, we’ll make things
all right again!
10194100000:
A twisted world full of
incomplete human spirit...
That would be an
intolerable nightmare
indeed.
10016500000:
When I think about a match
with a fabulous Trainer like
you, it’s like I’m walking
on air!
10126500000:
It’s true what they say.
Time really flies when
you’re having fun!
10257400000:
Let the winds blow! Stream
forward, Sandstorm!
10130100000:
Trainers are protected by
Pokémon, but they protect
Pokémon, too!
10118410000:
You all must really love tea!
I do, too!
10259400000:
This puzzle was created
by none other than the
queen and Pokémon
Professor—me!
10109400000:
Tea and sweets await!
Everyone smile!
